    Creating Histograms

    Figure 1

    Image 1 of 1: ‘Plant seedling’

    Blurring Images

    Figure 1

    Image 1 of 1: ‘Cat image’

    Figure 2

    Image 1 of 1: ‘Cat eye pixels’

    Figure 3

    Image 1 of 1: ‘Gaussian function’

    A Gaussian function maps random variables into a normal distribution or “Bell Curve”.
